author: rbb
msg: Cleanup the perchild MPM.  What I am doing so far in this MPM does not
require hashes.  This makes it much easier to now associate the child
process with a virtual host.

author: rbb
msg: Add the macro for AP_INIT_TAKE3 directives.  I am assuming this was left
out by mistake.

msg: periodic checkin. Dynamic handler registration implemented

msg: Add a small-version (16x16) of the Apache icon to this resource.

author: wrowe
msg: Some straightforward keys for Win9x (the NT path is not affected)...
added ImagePath and DisplayName to the Win9x service key for monitor
authors to iterate the registry and provide 'work-alike' capabilities.
Also, the console patch committed was to hold the console open on error.
This is the converse from closing apache and the console when Close is
selected from the window menu, or the window close button is clicked.
That problem remains :(
